how_it_works_page.title: How It Works
how_it_works_page.intro: Local Snow connects clients directly with ski and snowboard instructors. No booking fees, no abusive commissions. Here's how it works for both sides.

clients.title: For Clients Looking for Lessons
clients.step1_desc: Start on the homepage. Select your resort and sport (skiing or snowboarding). You'll see a list of instructors who work at that resort.
clients.step2_desc: Check instructor qualifications, languages spoken, experience, and pricing. Look for the verified badge - it means we've checked their certifications.
clients.step3_desc: Fill out a booking request with your dates, skill level, number of students, and any special requirements. Submit it through the instructor's profile.
clients.step3_note: Refundable deposit: You'll pay a €15 deposit to secure your booking and prevent spam. This is returned after your confirmed lesson.
clients.step4_desc: The instructor receives your request and responds with availability and pricing. You arrange lesson details directly with them - no middleman.
clients.step5_desc: You pay the instructor directly for the lessons - not through our platform. Cash, bank transfer, or however you agree. We don't handle lesson payments, so there are no booking fees.
clients.step6_desc: After your lesson, leave an honest review. It helps other clients find great instructors and gives instructors feedback.
clients.cost_no_fees: No booking fees - browse and request lessons for free
clients.cost_deposit: 15€ refundable deposit - required per booking request, returned after your confirmed lesson
clients.cost_unlimited: Unlimited instructors - contact as many instructors as you need

instructors.title: For Instructors Offering Lessons
instructors.step1_desc: Sign up and fill out your instructor profile. Add your qualifications, languages, resorts you work at, sports you teach, and base pricing.
instructors.step1_note: Takes 5 minutes. Your profile goes live immediately.
instructors.step2_desc: Upload your certification documents to apply for verification. A verified badge appears on your profile, which helps you stand out and builds trust with clients.
instructors.step3_desc: When a client requests a lesson, you get an email notification. You'll see their dates, skill level, and requirements.
instructors.step4_desc: To view the client's contact information and respond, you pay a one-time 5€ lead fee per request. This covers platform costs and prevents spam requests.
instructors.step4_note: You only pay if you want to respond. You can decline requests at no cost.
instructors.step5_desc: Contact the client, confirm availability, and agree on lesson details. You handle scheduling, location, and pricing on your terms.
instructors.step6_desc: The client pays you directly for the lessons. Cash, bank transfer, Bizum - however you prefer. We don't process payments, so there are no commissions or fees on your lessons.
instructors.step6_note: You keep 100% of what you charge for lessons.
instructors.cost_free: Free profile listing - create and maintain your profile at no cost
instructors.cost_lead: 5€ per lead - only pay when you want to respond to a booking request
instructors.cost_no_commission: No commissions - keep 100% of your lesson fees
instructors.cost_no_monthly: No monthly fees - pay only for leads you choose to pursue

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.deposit_a: It prevents spam and fake requests. The deposit is fully refundable after your confirmed lesson with the instructor. Each booking request requires a deposit, which protects instructors from no-shows and ensures serious inquiries.
faq.lead_fee_q: Why the 5€ lead fee for instructors?
faq.lead_fee_a: It covers server costs, email notifications, and platform maintenance. Unlike booking platforms that take 15-20% commissions, we only charge for the initial connection - not the lessons themselves.
faq.payments_a: Clients pay instructors directly for lessons - we're not involved. The only payments processed through our platform are the client deposit (refundable) and instructor lead fees (5€ per request). Both are handled securely through Stripe.
faq.no_response_q: What if an instructor doesn't respond?
faq.no_response_a: Try another instructor. Instructors aren't obligated to respond to every request - they might be fully booked or unavailable for your dates. Your 15€ deposit remains valid for future requests.
faq.contact_q: Can instructors see my contact info before paying?
faq.contact_a: No. Instructors see your dates, skill level, and requirements, but contact information is hidden until they pay the 5€ lead fee. This protects both parties from spam.
